title: *SOLD* T206 Cy Young Glove Showing Piedmont Factory 42
author: Archive

posts.post_title: *SOLD* T206 Cy Young Glove Showing Piedmont Factory 42
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Steven K Smith
Ok here is one for you rare back Hall of fame collectors. I have for sale a very very rare T206 Piedmont factory 42 Cy Young Graded SGC 10.  I have never seen another one for sale and most collectors know that this back is one of the rarest out there ranked #9 overall.
